Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to joining multistate voter list maintenance organizations
Summary: Permits the state board of elections to join certain multistate voter list maintenance organizations and provide such organizations with certain voter information; requires the state to join a multistate voter list maintenance organization on or before July 31, 2026.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 10 §§5-1000 - 5-1004, El L; add §219-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to joining multistate voter list maintenance organizations
